verses.verse: And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> all <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H8085>them<s%>, Hear, O <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, the <S%H2706>statutes<s%> and <S%H4941>judgments<s%> which I <S%H1696>speak<s%> in your <S%H241>ears<s%> this <S%H3117>day<s%>, that you may <S%H3925>learn<s%> <S%H8104>them<s%>, and keep, and do <S%H6213>them<s%>.
The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H3772>made<s%> a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with us in <S%H2722>Horeb<s%>.

The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H3772>made<s%> not this <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with our <S%H1>fathers<s%>, but with <S%H587>us<s%>, even <S%H428>us<s%>, who are all of us here <S%H2416>alive<s%> this <S%H3117>day<s%>.
The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1696>talked<s%> with you <S%H6440>face<s%> to <S%H6440>face<s%> in the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> out of the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of the <S%H784>fire<s%>,

(I <S%H5975>stood<s%> between the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> and you at that <S%H6256>time<s%>, to <S%H5046>show<s%> you the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>: for you were <S%H3372>afraid<s%> by <S%H6440>reason<s%> of the <S%H784>fire<s%>, and went not <S%H5927>up<s%> into the <S%H2022%H99999>mountain<s%>;) saying,
I am the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>, which brought you <S%H3318>out<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, from the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H5650>bondage<s%>.
You shall have none <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%> before <S%H6440>me<s%>.

You shall not <S%H6213>make<s%> you any engraved <S%H6459>image<s%>, or any <S%H8544>likeness<s%> of any thing that is in <S%H8064>heaven<s%> <S%H4605>above<s%>, or that is in the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H4325>beneath<s%>, or that is in the waters beneath the <S%H776>earth<s%>:

You shall not bow <S%H7812>down<s%> yourself unto <S%H5647>them<s%>, nor serve <S%H3068>them<s%>: for I the Lord your <S%H430>God<s%> am a <S%H7067>jealous<s%> <S%H410>God<s%>, <S%H6485>visiting<s%> the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of the <S%H1>fathers<s%> upon the <S%H1121>sons<s%> unto the <S%H8029>third<s%> and <S%H7256>fourth<s%> generation of them that hate <S%H8130>me<s%>,
And <S%H6213>showing<s%> <S%H2617>mercy<s%> unto <S%H505>thousands<s%> of them that <S%H157>love<s%> me and <S%H8104>keep<s%> my <S%H4687>commandments<s%>.

You shall not <S%H5375>take<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> in <S%H7723>vain<s%>: for the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> will not hold him <S%H5352>guiltless<s%> that <S%H5375>takes<s%> his <S%H8034>name<s%> in <S%H7723>vain<s%>.
<S%H8104>Keep<s%> the <S%H7676>sabbath<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> to <S%H6942>sanctify<s%> <S%H3068>it<s%>, as the Lord your <S%H430>God<s%> has commanded <S%H6680>you<s%>.
<S%H8337>Six<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> you shall <S%H5647>labor<s%>, and <S%H6213>do<s%> all your <S%H4399>work<s%>:

But the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> is the <S%H7676>sabbath<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>: in it you shall not <S%H6213>do<s%> any <S%H4399>work<s%>, <S%H1121>you<s%>, nor your son, nor your <S%H1323>daughter<s%>, nor your <S%H5650>manservant<s%>, nor your <S%H519>maidservant<s%>, nor your <S%H7794>ox<s%>, nor your <S%H2543>donkey<s%>, nor any of your <S%H929>cattle<s%>, nor your <S%H1616>stranger<s%> that is inside your <S%H8179>gates<s%>; that your <S%H5650>manservant<s%> and your <S%H519>maidservant<s%> may rest as well as <S%H5117>you<s%>.

And <S%H2142>remember<s%> that you were a <S%H5650>servant<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, and that the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H3318>brought<s%> you out there through a <S%H2389>mighty<s%> <S%H3027>hand<s%> and by a stretched <S%H5186>out<s%> <S%H2220>arm<s%>: therefore the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> you to <S%H6213>keep<s%> the <S%H7676>sabbath<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%>.

<S%H3513>Honor<s%> your <S%H1>father<s%> and your <S%H517>mother<s%>, as the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H3117>you<s%>; that your days may be <S%H748>prolonged<s%>, and that it may go <S%H3190>well<s%> with <S%H127>you<s%>, in the land which the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> gives <S%H5414>you<s%>.
You shall not <S%H7523>kill<s%>.
Neither shall you commit <S%H5003>adultery<s%>.
Neither shall you <S%H1589>steal<s%>.
Neither shall you <S%H6030>bear<s%> <S%H7723>false<s%> <S%H5707>witness<s%> against your <S%H7453>neighbor<s%>.

Neither shall you <S%H2530>desire<s%> your <S%H7453>neighbour<s%>'s <S%H802>wife<s%>, neither shall you <S%H183>covet<s%> your <S%H7453>neighbour<s%>'s <S%H1004>house<s%>, his <S%H7704>field<s%>, or his <S%H5650>manservant<s%>, or his <S%H519>maidservant<s%>, his <S%H7794>ox<s%>, or his <S%H2543>donkey<s%>, or any thing that is your <S%H7453>neighbour<s%>'s.

These <S%H1697>words<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> unto all your <S%H6951>assembly<s%> in the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> out of the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of the <S%H784>fire<s%>, of the <S%H6051>cloud<s%>, and of the thick <S%H6205>darkness<s%>, with a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H6963>voice<s%>: and he added no <S%H3254>more<s%>. And he <S%H3789>wrote<s%> them in <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3871>tablets<s%> of <S%H68>stone<s%>, and delivered them unto <S%H5414>me<s%>.

And it came to <S%H8085>pass<s%>, when you heard the <S%H6963>voice<s%> out of the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of the <S%H2822>darkness<s%>, (for the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> did <S%H1197>burn<s%> with <S%H784>fire<s%>,) that you came <S%H7126>near<s%> unto <S%H7218>me<s%>, even all the heads of your <S%H7626>tribes<s%>, and your <S%H2205>elders<s%>;

And you <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H3068>Behold<s%>, the Lord our <S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H7200>showed<s%> us his <S%H3519>glory<s%> and his <S%H1433>greatness<s%>, and we have <S%H8085>heard<s%> his <S%H6963>voice<s%> out of the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of the <S%H784>fire<s%>: we have <S%H7200>seen<s%> this <S%H3117>day<s%> that <S%H430>God<s%> does <S%H1696>talk<s%> with <S%H120>man<s%>, and he <S%H2425>lives<s%>.

Now therefore why should we <S%H4191>die<s%>? for this <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H784>fire<s%> will <S%H398>consume<s%> <S%H8085>us<s%>: if we hear the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> any <S%H3254>more<s%>, then we shall <S%H4191>die<s%>.

For who is there of all <S%H1320>flesh<s%>, that has <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1696>speaking<s%> out of the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of the <S%H784>fire<s%>, as we <S%H2421>have<s%>, and lived?

Go you <S%H7126>near<s%>, and <S%H8085>hear<s%> all that the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> shall <S%H559>say<s%>: and <S%H1696>speak<s%> you unto us all that the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> shall <S%H1696>speak<s%> unto <S%H8085>you<s%>; and we will hear <S%H6213>it<s%>, and do it.

And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of your <S%H1697>words<s%>, when you <S%H1696>spoke<s%> unto <S%H3068>me<s%>; and the Lord <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H8085>me<s%>, I have heard the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H1697>words<s%> of this <S%H5971>people<s%>, which they have <S%H1696>spoken<s%> unto <S%H3190>you<s%>: they have well said all that they have <S%H1696>spoken<s%>.

O that there were <S%H2088>such<s%> <S%H4310>an<s%> <S%H3824>heart<s%> in <S%H5414>them<s%>, that they would <S%H3372>fear<s%> <S%H8104>me<s%>, and keep all my <S%H4687>commandments<s%> <S%H3117>always<s%>, that it might be <S%H3190>well<s%> with <S%H1121>them<s%>, and with their sons for <S%H5769>ever<s%>!
<S%H3212>Go<s%> <S%H559>say<s%> to <S%H7725>them<s%>, Get you into your <S%H168>tents<s%> <S%H7725>again<s%>.

But as for <S%H5975>you<s%>, stand you here by <S%H5978>me<s%>, and I will <S%H1696>speak<s%> unto you all the <S%H4687>commandments<s%>, and the <S%H2706>statutes<s%>, and the <S%H4941>judgments<s%>, which you shall <S%H3925>teach<s%> <S%H6213>them<s%>, that they may do them in the <S%H776>land<s%> which I <S%H5414>give<s%> them to possess <S%H3423>it<s%>.

You shall <S%H8104>observe<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> therefore as the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H5493>you<s%>: you shall not turn aside to the right <S%H3225>hand<s%> or to the <S%H8040>left<s%>.

You shall <S%H3212>walk<s%> in all the <S%H1870>ways<s%> which the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H2421>you<s%>, that you may live, and that it may be <S%H2895>well<s%> with <S%H748>you<s%>, and that you may prolong your <S%H3117>days<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> which you shall <S%H3423>possess<s%>.
